title: Apron
description: pieced green center printed fabric surrounded by 2 3/4\" applied embroidered and appliqued band of swirls; outside border is blue cotton; extended bands at waist are also embroidered and appliqued and include strips of plain and print cotton; narrow ties sewn to both extensions; backed with dark blue cotton
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
